events.message: I received my new headphones today, but one side is completely dead and no sound is coming out.
The issue was identified as a product defect due to the faulty headphone sound output problem reported.
This case has been assigned to support agent Emily Johnson to handle the product defect inquiry.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the problem with your headphones. Let’s get this sorted out.
Could you please confirm the order number and let me know if there is any visible external damage or scratches on the headphones?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. There are no scratches or external damage that I can see on the headphones.
Thanks for the info. We can send you a replacement pair right away or offer a full refund if you prefer. Which option would you like?
I would like to get a replacement if possible. Thanks for the quick response and help!
Great! We have processed your replacement order. It should arrive within 5 business days. We will notify you when it ships.
Just checking in to make sure your replacement headphones arrived and are working perfectly. Please let us know if you need anything else.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our product.
